location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to Henry Willock, His Majesty's Charg√© D'Affairs at Tehran, from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf

physicalDescription.extent: The letter has been struck through in blue pencil.

mods.abstract: The letter is a covering letter, the original of which forwarded a statement of disbursements made on account of a mission from 1 May to 31 July 1825. Stannus requests that on receipt, a voucher be sent on his account.
